name: discord-movienight
excerpt: Experience Discord Movienight with a Java bot using Javacord & Maven, managing movie lists and data from OMDB API. Integrate ChatGPT for engaging conversations and Adam Sandler-style interactions.
description:
Discord Movienight

A discord bot written in Java, using Javacord & Maven.

Bot that keeps 'to-watch' list of movies that a discord server wants to watch. Movie-data is received from the OMDB Api and stored in .json files, both per server and in a cache file for recently called movie-data.

ChatGPT integration using sashirestela's simple-openai library to allow users to talk to the bot, who pretends to be Adam Sandler. Also used to generate some custom remarks about planned movies & etc.
